page.title: 04SHOPPING IN 03560216
page.content: On the 6th June 1985 we went out to ask people in shops if they were shopping there.First of all we interviewed some shoppers. The first one we interviewed was at 10-14 am at Bishops Wood Petrol Station joined on to Wyeside Caravans LTD. We interviewed two people from Goodrich Post Office.One person was an old man waiting for his pension and the other was a middle-aged woman trying to get her daily needs like bread and milk. Next we interviewed a young boy around 11 years old his name was Samual Tomlin. We interviewed him at 11-20 am at Little Chef.
